entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Project References that are not listed in assets file aren't included in deps.json #28891
  • Publish target should return the items published #28890
  • Blazor Server Apps packed into a Tool can't find static assets #28881
  • Android Release : MainPage = new NavigationPage(new ContentPage()); crashes #28880
  • .NET 6: dotnet build not creating GeneratedMSBuildEditorConfig.editorconfig file? #28863

Closed

  • Code Coverage for RuntimeIdentifiers #28048

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28894
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28893
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Deps.json should include project references that aren't present in project.assets.json #28892
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Backport Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #28883
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28882
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Switch the resolver to target net7 as we expect VSMac to move forward… #28879
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable Codeql #28877
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28875
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add Blazor SWA Baseline Mismatched Assets Logging #27542
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #28876
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #28828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #28643
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #28857
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #28858
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Introduce PublishRuntimeIdentifier #28717
    Area-CLI
  • Remove the downlevel feeds to reduce overall footprint #28860
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Detect Corrupt Solution File in Dotnet Sln Add #28811
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve Tests for Implicit RIDs and Libraries #28696
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP]Introduce a shared project Microsoft.DotNet.ApiSymbolExtension #28855
    Area-GenAPI
  • Make PublishAot an optional feature because Mono does not support it. #28674
    Area-Infrastructure
